children.subject: I took Game Theory in the Social Sciences last semester with Andrew Little. I'm not sure if you can count on future semesters working the same way, but I did extremely well with very little effort. Some people in the class seemed to struggle a bit, but for me it was trivial compared to all of the EECS classes I have taken.

history.content:
I'd love to take 3 CS courses every semester, but recruiting and extra curricular activities pile up. Although I intend on taking 2 upper div CS for my tech electives, i'd like to have backups if i'm overwhelmed.

For me, Easy = low workload, generally easy to get a B or higher with minimal effort.

Examples: I've heard Public Health 142 is easy to get an A but has a ton of work, so I don't think it would be considered an easy tech elective.
history.subject: Easy Tech Electives for CS?
